Articles.Content:
my custom made Prometheus wont show any texture in KSP it just comes up black, i have been trying everything i could all day but nothing seems to work.

Also here is a vid of it in blender

I\'m not big on modeling, but from what I\'ve read, is it possible you have the wrong faces pointing outward?

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky
You need to give it a material.

@CaptSkunky: I tried that - what it gives is not a black poly but a nifty way to do fake transparency (backdrop-style - anything inside the model, provided it\'s visible, will be indeed visible.

@Payload: it used to be a necessity, but if I recall it was removed somewhere between .11 and .13.

WerTehMoon, have you made sure you UVW unwrapped your part correctly? That\'s the first thing that strikes me.

@Payload: it used to be a necessity, but if I recall it was removed somewhere between .11 and .13.

Not really, something did change and the loader can sometimes \'figure it out\' but I still had parts failing due to no materials in 0.13.

So its a sometimes thing.
